Kungälvs h. folksk. 35, v. komm. mellansk. där 36, rektor där 36, adj. i tyska o. eng. samt franska o. rektor v. Kungälvs samrealsk. ■sed. 45. translated: Kjellman, Rudolf Paulus, rektor (principal). Kungälv, born on 24/2/92 in Oskarshamn to O. R. K. and Sigrid Andersson. Married on 22 (year not specified) to Lisa Olofsson. Children: Olof, born in 24, Elna in 26, Urban in 27. Completed high school in Västervik in 10, earned a Bachelor's degree in 13. Traveled to England in 12 and 27, Germany in 14, 22, 29, and 34, Austria and Italy in 22, France with a government scholarship in 20. Served at Karlskoga Practical School and Folk High School from 14-15, worked at Torsås Higher Folk School as an administrator from 15-18, became a regular subject teacher there in 18, became principal of the municipal intermediate school in 19, became a regular subject teacher at Kungälv's public school in 35, the municipal intermediate school in 36, and rector of the same school in 36. Also served as an adjunct in German, English, and French, and as rector of Kungälv's secondary school since 45. Vice Chairman of the Municipal Council, member of the Municipal Assembly, chairman of the Municipal Board, member and vice-chairman of the Torsås Public School Board, member and chairman of the City Council in Kungälv, secretary and treasurer of the Melila Principal Association, chairman of the Municipal Intermediate School Committee, vice chairman of the Nordic Folk High School Association in Kungälv. Certificates: Short English grammar (3131), German, English, and French songs for language teaching (36). Awarded RVOlkl.

politicalAffiliations.organization: Nordic Folk High School Association in Kungälv
